akn:subsection.akn:heading: Definition of agriculture and food defense

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Definition of agriculture and food defense In this section, the term “agriculture and food defense” means any action to prevent, protect against, mitigate the effects of, respond to, or recover from a naturally occurring, unintentional, or intentional threat to the agriculture and food system.
(b) Authorization The Secretary shall establish in the Department the Office of Homeland Security.
(c) Executive Director The Office of Homeland Security shall be headed by an Executive Director, who shall be known as the Executive Director of Homeland Security.
